text: 2001–02 Polish Volleyball League was the 66th season of Polish Championship (2nd season as professional league) organized by Professional Volleyball League SA () under the supervision of Polish Volleyball Federation (). Skra Bełchatów and Gwardia Wrocław were promoted to Polish Volleyball League in this season. In season 2001/2002 Mostostal-Azoty Kędzierzyn-Koźle played in CEV Champions League, Galaxia AZS Częstochowa in CEV Top Teams Cup and Jastrzębie Borynia played in CEV Challenge Cup. Mostostal-Azoty Kędzierzyn- Koźle achieved 4th title of Polish Champion. ==Final standing== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left;" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the 2002–03 CEV Champions League |- |width=10px bgcolor=#bbebff| ||Qualified for the 2002–03 CEV Top Teams Cup |- |width=10px bgcolor=#e6f8ff| ||Qualified for the 2002–03 CEV Challenge Cup |- |width=10px bgcolor=#FFE7E7| ||Play-offs with the 2nd team of 1st league |- |width=10px bgcolor=#FFCCCC| ||Relegation to the 1st league |- |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !width=40|Rank !width=290|Team |- bgcolor=#ccffcc | |align=left|Mostostal-Azoty Kędzierzyn-Koźle |- bgcolor=#e6f8ff | |align=left|Galaxia AZS Częstochowa |- | |align=left|Skra Bełchatów |- |4 |align=left|Jastrzębie Borynia |- |5 |align=left|Gwardia Wrocław |- |6 |align=left|Stolarka Wołomin |- |7 |align=left|PZU AZS Olsztyn |- |8 |align=left|KS Nysa |- bgcolor=#FFE7E7 |9 |align=left|Morze Bałtyk Szczecin |- bgcolor=#FFCCCC |10 |align=left|Czarni Radom |- |} {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center; margin:auto" !2002 Polish Champions |- |Mostostal- Azoty Kędzierzyn-Koźle 4th title |} {| style="text-align: center; margin-top: 2em; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto" |- |Roland Dembończyk, Piotr Lipiński, Marek Kardoš, Dusan Kubica, Rafał Musielak, Wojciech Serafin, Robert Szczerbaniuk, Marcin Prus, Jarosław Stancelewski, Sebastian Świderski, Paweł Papke, Aleksander Januszkiewicz, Bartłomiej Soroka |- |Head Coach |- |Andrzej Kubacki |} ==References== Category:Polish Championship of men's volleyball seasons
